Database Structure
==================

1. submits
----------
* ID
* timestamp (uploaded)
* submitter IP
* user ID (users automatically generated per-IP in v1; in v2+ identified by a key entered by the user in the Java app) 

* timestamp (from SDR)
* gyro
* accelerometer
* temperature
* GNSS
* magnetometer

2. users
--------

v1
--
* ID
* IP
* blocked (default: 0)

v2
--
+ username
+ email address
+ submit key
(blah blah profile data)
+ status (public|private|deleted)
